message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"upstairs; the floor above","sentence":"他们在楼上。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation scene showing a group of people in a modern apartment, looking up towards the upper floor (upstairs). The upper floor is visible with a railing, and the environment is subtly overgrown with nature, beams of gentle, apocalyptic sunlight streaming through broken windows. The style is dreamy and softly animated, with warm tones and slightly faded colors.","sentence_translation":"They are upstairs."}
